What is the Liver?
What is the Liver?

• Makes chemicals that your body needs to stay healthy
• Makes chemicals that
your body needs to
stay healthy

• Removes waste
• Removes waste

products and other harmful substances from your blood • Guards against
products and other
harmful substances

The Liver is a Factory
The Liver is a Factory

• Builds and converts proteins and sugars
• Builds and converts proteins and sugars

• Stores vitamins, sugars, fats and other
• Stores vitamins, sugars, fats and other

nutrients
nutrients

• Releases chemicals and nutrients into
• Releases chemicals and nutrients into

the body when needed

What is Hepatitis?
What is Hepatitis?

• “Hepatitis” means inflammation of the liver
• “Hepatitis” means inflammation of the liver

• Can be caused by:
• Can be caused by:

– Genetic diseases
– Genetic diseases

– Medications (including over-the-counter)
– Medications (including over-the-counter)

– Alcohol
– Alcohol

– Hepatitis viruses (A,B,C,D,E)
– Hepatitis viruses (A,B,C,D,E)

What Are Liver Enzymes?

• Chemicals that your liver uses to do its work

– the level of enzymes in your blood is normal
